summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi Sternheim to Mark S. Cohen regarding the case U.S. v. Maxwell. It references a joint submission concerning a defense request related to the MDC warden, indicating ongoing procedural matters in Ghislaine Maxwell's case.

persons.name: Bobbi Sternheim
persons.context: Author of the email, communicating about a joint submission in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

persons.name: Mark S. Cohen
persons.context: Recipient of the email, involved in the U.S. v. Maxwell case.

connections.description: Communicating about a joint submission in the U.S. v. Maxwell case, indicating they are working together on legal matters.

events.title: Defense Request Regarding MDC Warden
events.description: A defense request was made concerning the Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC) warden, leading to a joint submission.

keyFacts: The email is dated December 2, 2020, from Bobbi Sternheim to Mark S. Cohen.
It references the case U.S. v. Maxwell, indicating it pertains to Ghislaine Maxwell's legal proceedings.
The communication concerns a joint submission related to a defense request about the MDC warden.
The email states that revisions to the submission do not change the respective positions of the parties involved.
An attachment titled 'BC_-2020-12-01_GMJetter_regarding_defense_request_re_MDC_warden.docx' is included, suggesting formal documentation on the matter.
